the US internet search giant in April. He will take over from Eric Schmidt , who has been in the job for a decade and will become executive chairman. Jaime Bayly and Collins stand up and kiss on the cheek, but their microphones remain on.`` Don't come here just to complain about my behavior,'' Jaime Bayly says angrily over the outro music. And don't be so damn boring. Jaime Bayly is a man of many parts. He's both David Letterman and Charlie Rose ; comedian and serious interviewer; straight and gay; shamelessly self-promoting and relentlessly self-deprecating. After a one-and-a-half-year hiatus, he

Jerry Lee Lewis jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a Jerry Lee Lewis , he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` My teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where I need the ball.
